EXTRACTED VALUE: He has represented Sweden at the 2002 World Cup Euro 2004 and the 2006 World Cup so this will be his fourth major finals.
Mellberg started out at Degerfors before joining AIK where he won the Swedish title in 1998.
Robben began his footballing career with local side Groningen but his potential was soon spotted by PSV Eindhoven and they landed him in 2002.
He had better luck at Porto and, after qualifying for citizenship in 2002, was soon called up to the national team despite some initial resistance.
Initially, there were question marks over the Dutchman's temperament, but attentions soon turned towards his undoubted raw ability.
And it is easy to see why he was rated in the 10million euro bracket.
